overview: As Vice President, Finance and Administration, Suki is responsible for the company’s financial and administrative operations. Prior to joining WhitePages.com, Suki was CFO of WSA (formerly the Washington Software Alliance). She also spent seven years at Sierra On-line, a leading provider of entertainment software, where she was quickly promoted to Vice-President of Finance and Administration during the company’s rapid expansion phase. She began her career in the San Jose office of Coopers & Lybrand. Suki is a Certified Public Accountant and she holds a BS in Commerce from Santa Clara University.
